# Export Secrets

**Source:** [`actions/ios-export-secrets/action.yml`](https://github.com/futuredapp/.github/blob/main/.github/actions/ios-export-secrets/action.yml)

Encodes secret values to Base64 and writes them into the specified .xcconfig file in KEY = VALUE format.

## Usage

```yaml
- uses: futuredapp/.github/.github/actions/ios-export-secrets@main
  with:
    XCCONFIG_PATH: '...'
```

## Inputs

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description |
|------|------|----------|---------|-------------|
| `XCCONFIG_PATH` | `string` | Yes | — | Path to the .xcconfig file. Selected secret properties will be appended to the end of this file. |
| `SECRET_PROPERTIES` | `string` | No | — | Secrets in the format KEY = VALUE (one per line). |
| `REQUIRED_KEYS` | `string` | No | — | Comma-separated list of required keys. |
